resp = client.search(
    index="products",
    size="0",
    query={
        "match": {
            "name": "led tv"
        }
    },
    aggs={
        "resellers": {
            "nested": {
                "path": "resellers"
            },
            "aggs": {
                "min_price": {
                    "min": {
                        "field": "resellers.price"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
